com.turn.ttorrent.client.peer

Interface PeerActivityListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SwarmHandler

    public interface PeerActivityListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    EventListener interface for objects that want to handle peer activity events like piece availability, or piece completion events, and more.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • handlePeerChoking

        void handlePeerChoking(PeerHandler peer)
        Peer choked handler.

        This handler is fired when a peer choked and now refuses to send data to us. This means we should not try to request or expect anything from it until it becomes ready again.

        Parameters:
        peer - The peer that choked.

      • handlePeerUnchoking

        void handlePeerUnchoking(PeerHandler peer)
        Peer ready handler.

        This handler is fired when a peer notified that it is no longer choked. This means we can send piece block requests to it and start downloading.

        Parameters:
        peer - The peer that became ready.

      • handlePieceAvailability

        void handlePieceAvailability(@Nonnull
                           PeerHandler peer,
                           @Nonnegative
                           int piece)
        Piece availability handler.

        This handler is fired when an update in piece availability is received from a peer's HAVE message.

        Parameters:
        peer - The peer we got the update from.
        piece - The piece that became available from this peer.

      • handleBitfieldAvailability

        void handleBitfieldAvailability(@Nonnull
                              PeerHandler peer,
                              @Nonnull
                              java.util.BitSet prevAvailablePieces,
                              @Nonnull
                              java.util.BitSet availablePieces)
        Bit field availability handler.

        This handler is fired when an update in piece availability is received from a peer's BITFIELD message.

        Parameters:
        peer - The peer we got the update from.
        availablePieces - The pieces availability bit field of the peer.

      • handleBlockSent

        void handleBlockSent(@Nonnull
                   PeerHandler peer,
                   @Nonnegative
                   int piece,
                   @Nonnegative
                   int offset,
                   @Nonnegative
                   int length)
        Piece upload completion handler.
        Parameters:
        peer - The peer the piece was sent to.
        piece - The piece in question.

      • handlePieceCompleted

        void handlePieceCompleted(@Nonnull
                        PeerHandler peer,
                        @Nonnegative
                        int piece,
                        @Nonnull
                        PieceHandler.Reception reception)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Piece download completion handler.

        This handler is fired when a piece has been downloaded entirely and the piece data has been revalidated.

        Note: the piece may not be valid after it has been downloaded, in which case appropriate action should be taken to redownload the piece.

        Parameters:
        peer - The peer we got this piece from.
        piece - The piece in question.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
